author: Cortex XSOAR

integration.description: The Office 365 IP Address and URL web service is a read-only API provided by Microsoft to expose the URLs and IPs used by Office 365. The Office 365 Feed integration fetches indicators from the service, with which you can create a list (allow list, block list, EDL, etc.) for your SIEM or firewall service to ingest and apply to its policy rules.
integration.name: Office 365 Feed

playbook.description: This playbook handles the tagging of Office365 indicators. Specify the tag to apply to these indicators in the playbook inputs. An example tag will be approved_white. If no inputs are specified, the indicators will be tagged for manual review. The user can specify whether a manual review incident is required.
playbook.name: TIM - Process Office365 indicators

description: The Office 365 IP Address and URL web service is a read-only API provided by Microsoft to expose the URLs and IPs used by Office 365. The Office 365 Feed integration fetches indicators from the service, with which you can create a list (whitelist, blacklist, EDL, etc.) for your SIEM or firewall service to ingest and apply to its policy rules.
name: Office 365 Feed
